name: Lucy Whitehead
bio: is a third-year TAPS and English Major. She is so excited for everyone to see the amazing work everyone has put into this wonderful production. She’s eternally grateful to the Red Rex cast and crew for putting their hearts and souls into her vision! She has previously worked on The Tempest (Co-Dir.), Arcadia (Asst. Dir.), After Hours (SM), A Midsummer Night’s Dream (ASM), The Ballad of Oedipus (ASM), and The Taming of the Shrew (APM). Her favorite tyrant is herself negotiating the rules of Uno.

name: Daniel Olmo
bio: is a fourth-year Computer Science major. He has previously worked on Troilus and Cressida (Asst. Production Manager) and 35MM: A Musical Exhibition (Asst. Production Manager). He's so excited for you all to see how the hard work his team has put into the show translates into the performances! His favorite tyrant is TYRANT by Beyoncé!!

name: Linden Martin
bio: is a second-year linguistics and German major. Their previous credits include Pericles (Scenic Designer), Happy Birthday Mars Rover (Assistant Technical Director), The Tempest (Stage Manager), and Arcadia (Assistant Stage Manager). Outside of the theater, you can find them on the rugby field.

name: Elisa Gao
bio: is a third-year Astrophysics and TAPS major. She designed costumes for Giselle (Ballet), As Y'all Like It, Coppélia (Ballet), 35MM: A Musical Exhibition, Sylvia (Ballet), Royal Flush, and Falsettos (Asst.). She worked on scenic design for The Tempest, Troilus and Cressida (Asst.), and Royal Flush. She performed as an ensemble member in the TAPS pro show Happy Birthday Mars Rover and On the Back of Before. She is also a dancer, stager, and Creative Director of UBallet.

name: Shanthal Ramos Bueno
bio: is a third-year RDI & sociology major. She has previously worked on If/then (Assistant Costume Designer), Cactus Flower (Co-Costume designer), and Our Town (Lead Costume Designer)! Her favorite tyrant is undoubtedly her mom #immigranthousehold

name: Jessica Washington
bio: is a fourth-year public policy and gender/sexuality studies major. She has previously worked on the If/Then (Assistant Props Designer) and The Tempest (Props Designer). She has been a designer for several Theater 24 shows and greatly enjoys being able to working with others to execute a fun and exciting collaboratively created show. Her favorite tyrant is Tyra Banks because the things she did to those women on Americas Next Top Model were certainly cruel and arguably unconstitutional.

name: Seth Wang
bio: is a third year Anthropology and Gender Studies major. He has previously worked on As Y'all Like It (Co-Director), Troilus and Cressida (Props), The Play That Goes Wrong (Asst. Props), Arcadia (Asst. Props), and Much Ado About Nothing (Asst. Scenic).

name: Cami Delgado
bio: is a third-year Astrophysics and Visual Arts major. Their previous UT credits include Taming of the Shrew (Assistant Lighting Designer), Richard III (Lighting Designer), The Play That Goes Wrong (Assistant Stage Manager), Much Ado About Nothing (Lighting Designer), Troilus and Cressida (Lighting Designer), and As Y'all Like It (Assistant Director/Dramaturg). One contender for their favorite tyrant is Emperor Norton, self-proclaimed Emperor of the United States and Protector of Mexico in the mid-19th century.

name: Remi Chin
bio: is a second-year MADD and Business Econ major. They have ASMed for If/Then with University Theater, and was Assistant Scenic and Sound of The Tempest, put on by Dean's Men. This quarter, they've also Stage Managed for the UT Workshop, The Burden of Burials: Sophocles' Antigone Reimagined. In support women's rights and women's wrongs, their favorite tyrant is Empress Dowager Cixi.

name: Josiah Rubio
bio: can often be spotted in places they have absolutely no business being. They've performed in a variety of shows in many roles, most notably co-directing The Tempest with Lucy (Spring, '25), and directing Pericles (like, last week, '26). their favorite tyrant is definitely not lucille aza whiteHead, as shE has been such a deLight and a Pleasant director to work with and not Scary at all beHind closEd doorS. she puts so much CARE and Sensitivity into her work and they could not be More proud to be hEr friend.

name: Evan Stuart
bio: is a first-year majoring in CMST or TAPS or something. They have previously worked on Our Town (Assistant Costumes) and are also on El Cepillo de Dientes (Costume Designer) this quarter.

name: Jasmine Li
bio: is a third-year Anthropology and (potentially) Linguistics major. She has previously worked on As Y'all Like It (Stage Manager), Cactus Flower (ASM), Troilus and Cressida (ASM), Strings Attached (APM), and Taming of the Shrew (ASM). Her chosen king/tyrant is the Great King Oikawa Tōru (as per request of a friend whose favorite Haikyuu!! character is Oikawa, and in celebration of her older sibling's Oikawa fridge magnet).

name: Anoushka Gehani
bio: is a Master's student studying Public Policy but wishes it was Theatre Production. She's worked as Assistant Projectionist on Happy Birthday Mars Rover and is happy to be here.

name: Chenoah D
bio: (Shey-Noah) is a 3rd year Linguistics major. This is her first time assisting with a theater production and is happy to be learning about lighting. Big shoutout to cami for their patience and guidance throughout the process!

name: Alasdair Dodd
bio: is a fourth-year East Asian Languages & Civilizations and Religious Studies major. He has previously worked on Falsettos (Lighting Designer), A Midsummer Night’s Dream (Stage Manager), The Arsonists (Lighting Designer), Troilus & Cressida (Co-Production Manager), The Tempest (Production Manager), As Y’all Like It (Production Manager), and The 25th Annual Putnam County Spelling Bee (Lighting Designer). His favorite(?) tyrant is Oliver Cromwell.
